title: Simplee to Explore Healthcare Provider Innovations in Patient Financial Experience at AAHAM Annual National Institute
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/16/2015 @ 7:15 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Simplee 
PALO ALTO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/16/15 -- Simplee ®, the healthcare technology leader in patient payment and engagement, announced that Chief Marketing and Growth Officer John Adractas will explore the patient's financial experience at the American Association of Healthcare Administrative Management (AAHAM) Annual National Institute (ANI) today in Orlando, Florida. 
The presentation will examine a model for engagement in patient revenue cycle and review case study evidence from select providers across the country focused on transforming the patient financial experience. Adractas urges attendees to consider how "rising patient responsibility demands a modern patient financial experience that effectively communicates value and creates a brand opportunity." Increases in patient satisfaction, net collections, and lower cost per payment are enabling early adopters to build patient loyalty in addition to reaping financial gains. 
Each year, AAHAM ANI brings together the nation's healthcare leaders to exchange ideas, share learnings, and expand their knowledge in pursuit of improved patient account management. The theme for this year's event is "The Wonderful World of Revenue Cycle." 
Adractas will present on Friday, October 16th at 10:30am Eastern Time in a session titled: "An Engagement Success: Why Patients are Happier and Paying More." 
To learn more about Simplee and its Financial Engagement Platform for healthcare, please visit simplee.com . 
About Simplee Financial Engagement Platform 
Simplee Financial Engagement Platform empowers healthcare providers to deliver a modern, patient financial experience that combines engagement, billing, and payment technology. The Simplee platform offers customers an integrated SaaS solution for patient revenue cycle with options including Simplee®ESTIMATE, Simplee®PAY, and Simplee®CREDIT. 
Simplee is currently in use by 668 healthcare providers around the country. Hospitals and physician groups using Simplee achieve 15% higher net collections, 20% lower cost per payment, and over 80% of patients recommending them due to the recent billing and payment experience. 
About Simplee 
Simplee® is transforming the patient financial experience. Headquartered in Palo Alto, Calif., Simplee offers healthcare a complete financial experience suite that patients love. We are reimagining the patient revenue cycle with award winning ( Fierce Healthcare , Webby , and more), cloud technology designed to integrate engagement and payment.
